meta.description: eXide - a web based XQuery IDE
meta.author: Wolfgang Meier
meta.note: If you are updating to this version of eXide, you may need to bypass the browser's cache (and cookies). On most browsers, hold Ctrl (IE) or Shift (Firefox, Safari, Chrome) and click the reload button.

ul.li: Set syntax to XQuery for code snippets passed in from demo app
Change indicator "*" not cleared properly after save
